Last Stand.description: When your health is below 20%, you can make two moves in a row.

Strength of Men.description: You have basic healing abilities. Heal a party member for d10 health.

Rally.description: Once per day, You can use an aura which reinvigorates their comrades.

Fixit Dwarf.description: Given a few hours, you can repair most steel made items.

Miner's Eye.description: When dealing with minerals or works made of stone, your character's intelligence is treated as Masterful.

Dark Vision.description: You can see well in the dark.

Sleepless.description: Elves can go days without sleeping, allowing them to keep watch long into the night.

Wink Wink, Nudge Nudge.description: You can influence men and halflings with their beauty.

Sling.description: Your character carries a sling, with which they are uncannily accurate.

Warm Butter.description: Your is an are naturally talented chef, and food that they cook restores extra health..

Soft Bed.description: You recover full health from sleeping in a real bed.

Softfoot.description: You are naturally good at sneaking.

Lamb to Slaughter.description: When hunting, You have high perception..

Bellow.description: You can unleash a mighty bellow to intimidate your foes.

Still Warm.description: You can eat raw meat without penalty.

Along Came a Spider.description: You are naturally adept at climbing.

Fisher.description: Catterwol are naturally good at fishing.

They're Retractable.description: You have retractable, razor sharp claws.

Berserk.description: Once per day, a you can go into a rage, increasing strength and vitality but decreasing intelligence and perception.

Intimidate.description: You have a higher chance to intimidate enemies.

Crushing Blow.description: You have a chance of hitting an enemy so hard it demoralizes others.

Huntsman.description: You are a skilled hunter by necessity.

Mount and Blade.description: You can swap your dexterity and strength stats while on horseback.

Woodsman.description: You are apt at traversing the wilds.

Medicine.description: Given a few hours, you can usually produce herbal remedies for ailments.

Summon Old Friend.description: Once per area, you can summon an old friend.

Under The Stars.description: You have been forced to learn to sleep anywhere without penalty, and can build shelters quickly.

Learned.description: You are learned, and know many languages and locales.

Tavern-Seer.description: You can learn almost anything in a tavern.

Historian.description: You have a deep knowledge of the land in which you are in.

Crippling Shot.description: You can choose to aim for an opponent's knees with increased accuracy.

Good Looks.description: Your presence increases party cheer in good weather, and decreases it in bad weather.

Earth, Wind, or Fire.description: You can choose one of the four elements to have power over.

Fletcher.description: Given the right materials, you can make their own arrows.

A Dry Place to Sleep.description: You can summon a hut big enough for two.

PULL.description: If enemies are in a row and close enough, a your shot will pass right through them.

Wayfarer.description: You are in it for the long haul, and take longer to tire than others.

Old Hand.description: You have a deep understanding of the limits of your bodies and of others.

Meditate.description: You can restore your health more quickly by meditating.

Nimble Fingers.description: You have a higher chance of not being discovered when stealing.

Rusted Sword.description: You begins his adventure with a rusted set of armor and a sword. Causes tetanus.

Inner Eye.description: You are more likely to detect spiritual energy.

Double Tap.description: Once per engagement, you can shoot two arrows at a time.
